rows.label: tlk41200121_03_msg0001
rows.name:
It looks like Peline from Cmalaf Artwork
is looking for an owner.

rows.label: tlk41200121_03_msg0002
rows.name:
She just wants it to be someone
who really loves art.

rows.label: tlk41200121_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Maybe if you help increase the shop's product line,
or buy up everything they have,
she might trust you.

rows.label: tlk41200121_03_msg0004
rows.name:
But are there any perks to becoming
an owner?
